rules.content: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.
When ~ enters, if you control eight or more lands, create a 4/4 green Rabbit creature token.
{i}Landfall{/i} {-} Whenever a land you control enters, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 8 or greater. If you do, create a 4/4 green Rabbit creature token.
